title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Would you like to be more involved with the John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site? These pages will give you some ideas. Visit Work with Us to see current paid and volunteer positions. Check out Support Your Park to find out how you can give back by volunteering or making a donation. Curious to see how we are celebrating the National Park Service Centennial and how you can be part of the party? Visit NPS Centennial for more information.  Â     The rangers, interns and volunteers at John F. Kennedy National Historic Site invite YOU to get involved and join us for the Centennial of the National Park Service! NPS
